TEXT.English: Citizens in %s1 have begun rioting and looting after a notorious rebel faction killed the city governor in his mansion.
TEXT.French: Les Citoyens de %s1 se soulèvent et pillent la Ville à la suite de l'assassinat du Gouverneur par une faction rebelle.
TEXT.German: Citizens in %s1 have begun rioting and looting after a notorious rebel faction killed the city governor in his mansion.
TEXT.Italian: Citizens in %s1 have begun rioting and looting after a notorious rebel faction killed the city governor in his mansion.
TEXT.Spanish: Citizens in %s1 have begun rioting and looting after a notorious rebel faction killed the city governor in his mansion.

TEXT.English: Citizens in %s1 have begun rioting and looting after a spy from %s2 framed a notorious rebel faction for the death of the city governor.
TEXT.French: Les Citoyens de %s1 se soulèvent et pillent la Ville à la suite de l'accusation proférée par un espion de %s2 concernant la mort du Gouverneur, apparemment tué par une faction rebelle.
TEXT.German: Citizens in %s1 have begun rioting and looting after a spy from %s2 framed a notorious rebel faction for the death of the city governor.
TEXT.Italian: Citizens in %s1 have begun rioting and looting after a spy from %s2 framed a notorious rebel faction for the death of the city governor.
TEXT.Spanish: Citizens in %s1 have begun rioting and looting after a spy from %s2 framed a notorious rebel faction for the death of the city governor.

TEXT.English: You kept our city!
TEXT.French: You kept our city!
TEXT.German: You kept our city!
TEXT.Italian: You kept our city!
TEXT.Spanish: You kept our city!

TEXT.English: Power in the city of %s1 has been restored.
TEXT.French: L'Electricité de la Ville de %s1 a été restaurée.
TEXT.German: Power in the city of %s1 has been restored.
TEXT.Italian: Power in the city of %s1 has been restored.
TEXT.Spanish: Power in the city of %s1 has been restored.

TEXT.English: Power plants in the city of %s1 have been temporarily disabled by a spy from %s2.
TEXT.French: Les Centrales électriques de la Ville de %s1 ont été désactivées. On suspecte l'intervention d'un espion de %s2.
TEXT.German: Power plants in the city of %s1 have been temporarily disabled by a spy from %s2.
TEXT.Italian: Power plants in the city of %s1 have been temporarily disabled by a spy from %s2.
TEXT.Spanish: Power plants in the city of %s1 have been temporarily disabled by a spy from %s2.

TEXT.English: A defect in a power generator in the city of %s1 has led to a temporary loss of power.
TEXT.French: Un défaut d'un générateur d'une centrale électrique de la Ville de %s1 a conduit à une coupure de l'électricité.
TEXT.German: A defect in a power generator in the city of %s1 has led to a temporary loss of power.
TEXT.Italian: A defect in a power generator in the city of %s1 has led to a temporary loss of power.
TEXT.Spanish: A defect in a power generator in the city of %s1 has led to a temporary loss of power.

TEXT.English: %s1 infiltrators have supported a rebellion within our lands!
TEXT.French: Des espions %s1 infiltrés ont apporté leur soutien aux rebelles dans notre territoire!!
TEXT.German: %s1 infiltrators have supported a rebellion within our lands!
TEXT.Italian: %s1 infiltrators have supported a rebellion within our lands!
TEXT.Spanish: %s1 infiltrators have supported a rebellion within our lands!

TEXT.English: Aid Rebel Factions
TEXT.French: Aider les Factions Rebelles
TEXT.German: Aid Rebel Factions
TEXT.Italian: Aid Rebel Factions
TEXT.Spanish: Aid Rebel Factions

TEXT.English: Disable Power Grid
TEXT.French: Désactiver la production d'électricité
TEXT.German: Disable Power Grid
TEXT.Italian: Disable Power Grid
TEXT.Spanish: Disable Power Grid

TEXT.English: Plant Nuclear Device
TEXT.French: Placer une arme nucléaire
TEXT.German: Plant Nuclear Device
TEXT.Italian: Plant Nuclear Device
TEXT.Spanish: Plant Nuclear Device

TEXT.English: Advanced Espionage
TEXT.French: Espionnage Avancé
TEXT.German: Advanced Espionage
TEXT.Italian: Advanced Espionage
TEXT.Spanish: Advanced Espionage

TEXT.English: Allows for powerful espionage attacks, including nuclear sabatoge, aiding rebel factions, and causing empire-wide anarchy. Also, espionage effects, like poisoning water, will correctly scale for gamespeeds.
TEXT.French: Permet des actes offensifs importants pour les espions, comme le sabotage nucléaire, le soutien aux factions rebelles, pouvant mener à un désordre au niveau de l'Empire. Les effets de l'espionnages sont également revus pour s'adapter à la vitesse du Jeu.
TEXT.German: Allows for powerful espionage attacks, including nuclear sabatoge, aiding rebel factions, and causing empire-wide anarchy. Also, espionage effects, like poisoning water, will correctly scale for gamespeeds.
TEXT.Italian: Allows for powerful espionage attacks, including nuclear sabatoge, aiding rebel factions, and causing empire-wide anarchy. Also, espionage effects, like poisoning water, will correctly scale for gamespeeds.
TEXT.Spanish: Allows for powerful espionage attacks, including nuclear sabatoge, aiding rebel factions, and causing empire-wide anarchy. Also, espionage effects, like poisoning water, will correctly scale for gamespeeds.

TEXT.English: Anti-War Rallies in %s1, incited by a %s2 spy, have been causing trouble for local officials.
TEXT.French: Les Pacifistes se rassemblent dans %s1, incités par un espion %s2, et engendrent des troubles que les autorités locales peinent à contrôler.
TEXT.German: Anti-War Rallies in %s1, incited by a %s2 spy, have been causing trouble for local officials.
TEXT.Italian: Anti-War Rallies in %s1, incited by a %s2 spy, have been causing trouble for local officials.
TEXT.Spanish: Anti-War Rallies in %s1, incited by a %s2 spy, have been causing trouble for local officials.

TEXT.English: Anti-War Rallies in %s1 have been causing trouble for local officials.
TEXT.French: Les Pacifistes se rassemblent dans %s1 et engendrent des troubles que les autorités locales peinent à contrôler.
TEXT.German: Anti-War Rallies in %s1 have been causing trouble for local officials.
TEXT.Italian: Anti-War Rallies in %s1 have been causing trouble for local officials.
TEXT.Spanish: Anti-War Rallies in %s1 have been causing trouble for local officials.

TEXT.English: Stage Anti-War Rally
TEXT.French: Organiser un Rassemblement Pacifiste
TEXT.German: Stage Anti-War Rally
TEXT.Italian: Stage Anti-War Rally
TEXT.Spanish: Stage Anti-War Rally

TEXT.English: Causes a nuclear detonation in the city of %s1. (May cause war and injure friendly units)
TEXT.French: Provoque une détonation nucléaire dans la Ville de %s1. (Peut entaîner une Guerre, et causer des dommages aux unités amies)
TEXT.German: Causes a nuclear detonation in the city of %s1. (May cause war and injure friendly units)
TEXT.Italian: Causes a nuclear detonation in the city of %s1. (May cause war and injure friendly units)
TEXT.Spanish: Causes a nuclear detonation in the city of %s1. (May cause war and injure friendly units)

TEXT.English: Causes Rebel Factions in %s1 to gain popular support.
TEXT.French: Permet aux faction rebelles de %s1 d'obtenir plus de soutien du peuple.
TEXT.German: Causes Rebel Factions in %s1 to gain popular support.
TEXT.Italian: Causes Rebel Factions in %s1 to gain popular support.
TEXT.Spanish: Causes Rebel Factions in %s1 to gain popular support.

TEXT.English: Will disable the power grid in %s1 for %d2 [NUM2:turn:turns].
TEXT.French: Désactive l'aprovisionnement en électricité dans %s1 pour %d2 [NUM2:turn:turns].
TEXT.German: Will disable the power grid in %s1 for %d2 [NUM2:turn:turns].
TEXT.Italian: Will disable the power grid in %s1 for %d2 [NUM2:turn:turns].
TEXT.Spanish: Will disable the power grid in %s1 for %d2 [NUM2:turn:turns].

TEXT.English: Will temporarily increase the war weariness in %s1 by %d2%.
TEXT.French: Augmente temporairement le mécontentement lié à la guerre de %d2% dans la Ville de %s1.
TEXT.German: Will temporarily increase the war weariness in %s1 by %d2%.
TEXT.Italian: Will temporarily increase the war weariness in %s1 by %d2%.
TEXT.Spanish: Will temporarily increase the war weariness in %s1 by %d2%.

TEXT.English: All of our research in %s1 has been destroyed by a %s2 spy!
TEXT.French: Tous nos travaux de recherche à %s1 ont été détruits par un espion %s2!
TEXT.German: All of our research in %s1 has been destroyed by a %s2 spy!
TEXT.Italian: All of our research in %s1 has been destroyed by a %s2 spy!
TEXT.Spanish: All of our research in %s1 has been destroyed by a %s2 spy!

TEXT.English: All of our research in %s1 has been destroyed!
TEXT.French: Tous nos travaux de recherche à %s1 ont été détruits!
TEXT.German: All of our research in %s1 has been destroyed!
TEXT.Italian: All of our research in %s1 has been destroyed!
TEXT.Spanish: All of our research in %s1 has been destroyed!

TEXT.English: Sabatoge Research
TEXT.French: Saboter la Recherche
TEXT.German: Sabatoge Research
TEXT.Italian: Sabatoge Research
TEXT.Spanish: Sabatoge Research

TEXT.English: Will sabatoge all of %s1's research in %s2
TEXT.French: Saboter les recherches de %s2 à %s1
TEXT.German: Will sabatoge all of %s1's research in %s2
TEXT.Italian: Will sabatoge all of %s1's research in %s2
TEXT.Spanish: Will sabatoge all of %s1's research in %s2

TEXT.English: Remove Religions
TEXT.French: Faire disparaître les Religions
TEXT.German: Remove Religions
TEXT.Italian: Remove Religions
TEXT.Spanish: Remove Religions

TEXT.English: Will remove %s1 from %s2.
TEXT.French: Faire disparaître la religion %s1 de %s2.
TEXT.German: Will remove %s1 from %s2.
TEXT.Italian: Will remove %s1 from %s2.
TEXT.Spanish: Will remove %s1 from %s2.

TEXT.English: The people of %s1 have been tricked by %s2 spies into abandoning their faith in %s3!
TEXT.French: Le Peuple de %s1, incité par un espion %s2, est en train d'abandonner leur croyance en la religion %s3!
TEXT.German: The people of %s1 have been tricked by %s2 spies into abandoning their faith in %s3!
TEXT.Italian: The people of %s1 have been tricked by %s2 spies into abandoning their faith in %s3!
TEXT.Spanish: The people of %s1 have been tricked by %s2 spies into abandoning their faith in %s3!

TEXT.English: The people of %s1 have abandonded their faith in %s2!!!
TEXT.French: Le Peuple de %s1 a abandonné leur croyance en la religion %s2!!!
TEXT.German: The people of %s1 have abandonded their faith in %s2!!!
TEXT.Italian: The people of %s1 have abandonded their faith in %s2!!!
TEXT.Spanish: The people of %s1 have abandonded their faith in %s2!!!

TEXT.English: Remove Corporations
TEXT.French: Démanteler les Corporations
TEXT.German: Remove Corporations
TEXT.Italian: Remove Corporations
TEXT.Spanish: Remove Corporations

TEXT.English: The people of %s1 have been tricked by %s2 spies into boycotting %s3!
TEXT.French: Le Peuple de %s1, incité par un espion %s2, boycotte %s3!
TEXT.German: The people of %s1 have been tricked by %s2 spies into boycotting %s3!
TEXT.Italian: The people of %s1 have been tricked by %s2 spies into boycotting %s3!
TEXT.Spanish: The people of %s1 have been tricked by %s2 spies into boycotting %s3!

TEXT.English: The people of %s1 have boycotted %s2!!!
TEXT.French: Le Peuple de %s1 boycotte %s2!!!
